original_text: And when the king heard the saying of the man of God, which he cried against the altar at Bethel, Jeroboam stretched out his hand from the altar, saying, “Seize him.” And his hand, which he stretched out against him, dried up, so that he could not draw it back to himself.
korean_text: 여로보암 왕이 하나님의 사람이 벧엘에 있는 제단을 향하여 외쳐 말함을 들을 때에 제단에서 손을 펴며 그를 잡으라 하더라 그를 향하여 편 손이 말라 다시 거두지 못하며

sentences.original_text: And when the king heard the saying of the man of God,
sentences.korean_translation: 왕이 하나님의 사람의 말을 들었을 때,

sentences.original_text: which he cried against the altar at Bethel,
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 벧엘 제단을 향해 외친 그 말,

sentences.original_text: Jeroboam stretched out his hand from the altar,
And his hand, which he stretched out against him,
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그를 향해 뻗은 그의 손이,

sentences.original_text: so that he could not draw it back to himself.
sentences.korean_translation: 자기에게로 거두어 들일 수 없게 되었다.
